CustomField.description: Primary telephone number for this business. Phone uses the standard North American Numbering Plan format of first 3 digits as the area code followed by a 3-digit Central Office (exchange) code and a 4-digit subscriber number. Phone contains no parentheses, spaces or hyphens and is left blank if the telephone number is not known.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First 3 digits as the area code followed by a 3-digit Central Office (exchange) code and a 4-digit subscriber number. Contains no parentheses, spaces or hyphens and is left blank if unknown.
CustomField.label: Phone
